name: GDKO Round 1 - Otakulady89
description:
This is my submission to round one of the GDKO GameJam, found here: https://itch.io/jam/gdko-round-1

The challenge was to build a character with a unique ability. Anise is the character I built, with her unique ability of "Draw a Card". Depending on the card she draws, different affects happen in combat!
